pages.text: A $(thing)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ uses $(l:base_concepts/pressure)pressure/$ and/or $(l:base_concepts/heat)heat/$ to process materials. It has several uses:$(li)100mB $(thing)LPG/$ and 1 piece of $(item)Coal/$ makes 1000mB of $(l:components/plastic)Plastic/$. This requires heat, but no pressure.$(li)1000mB of $(thing)Diesel/$ and 1 piece of $(item)Redstone Dust/$ makes 1000mB of $(l:components/lubricant)Lubricant/$. Again, this requires heat, but no pressure.

$(li)The $(item)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ can be used to crack heavier fuels produced by a $(l:manufacturing/refinery)Refinery/$ into lighter fuels at an 80% return rate:$(li)Diesel -> Kerosene$(li)Kerosene -> Gasoline$(li)Gasoline -> LPG$(p)This requires both heat and pressure.

pages.title: CraftTweaker
pages.text: The $(thing)Thermopneumatic Processing Plant/$ has $(l:https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/crafttweaker)CraftTweaker/$ support: recipes can be added and removed. Follow the link below for more information.
